meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unceremonious.
meanings.sent1: Her unceremoniousness surprised everyone at the formal event.
meanings.sent2: The unceremoniousness of his greeting made me feel unwelcome.
meanings.sent3: The unceremoniousness of the cat knocking over the vase was both funny and frustrating.
meanings.sent4: The unceremoniousness of the storm's arrival caught us off guard.
meanings.sent5: The unceremoniousness of the chef's presentation left much to be desired.

meanings.sent1: The unceremoniousness of his speech offended many in the audience.
meanings.sent2: She was taken aback by the unceremoniousness of his dismissal.
meanings.sent3: The unceremoniousness of the squirrel stealing the picnic basket was comical.
meanings.sent4: The unceremoniousness of the news shook the entire community.
meanings.sent5: The unceremoniousness of the teacher's reprimand left the student embarrassed.
